backend/main.mo: Motoko actor exposing simple health check and version query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining the required CoinPaprika API key variable.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application root and main bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering header, crypto dashboard, theme toggle, and health check logging.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that switches between light and dark themes using the useTheme hook.
frontend/src/features/crypto/CryptoDashb: Dashboard UI showing top crypto assets with loading, error handling, and fallback image logic.
frontend/src/features/crypto/types.ts: Type definitions for CryptoAsset and market data response shapes.
frontend/src/features/crypto/useCryptoMa: React Query hook fetching CoinPaprika tickers with API key validation, topâ€‘50 filtering, and asset mapping.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing the backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch backend health and version using an actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Implements a light/dark theme hook that syncs theme state with localStorage and applies a CSS class.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, dark mode, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the cryptocurrency dashboard.
